dict.string:
Bodyweight Exercise:
1. Brisk five-minute warmup walk, then: 2. Jog 400m (or 3 minutes) 3. Walk 200m (or 90 seconds) 4. Jog 800m (or 5 minutes) 5. Walk 400m (or 2-1/2 minutes) 6. Jog 400m (or 3 minutes) 7. Walk 200m (or 90 seconds) 8. Jog 800m (or 5 minutes)

Bodyweight Exercise: 60 sec rest between sets
1. Squats 5x - 2 sets 2. Glute Bridges 7x - 2 sets 3. Rows/Reverse Push-ups 9x - 2 sets 4. Push-ups 11x - 2 sets

Bodyweight Excercise:
1. Brisk five-minute warmup walk, then: 2. Jog 400m (or 3 minutes) 3. Walk 200m (or 90 seconds) 4. Jog 800m (or 5 minutes) 5. Walk 400m (or 2-1/2 minutes) 6. Jog 400m (or 3 minutes) 7. Walk 200m (or 90 seconds) 8. Jog 800m (or 5 minutes)

Bodyweight Exercise: 60 sec rest between sets
1. Squats 6x - 2 sets 2. Glute Bridges 8x - 2 sets 3. Rows/Reverse Push-ups 10x - 2 sets 4. Push-ups 12x - 2 sets
